review: This strap is a great strap. It is comfortable. It is adjustable. It just looks great. I have not used the pick holder yet.
The picks are good. They are a little flimsey but are ok. The best thing about them is the look
This is very accurate and also very easy to use. The led is easy to see in well lite area as well as dark area. I loved the price.
I needed an inexpensive music stand for my guitar lessons. This worked well for that.
Great for beginners and experts. The sound is great and is easy on the fingers.  I got them recommended by a friend
